def compare_word_sets(phrase1: str, phrase2: str):
    set1 = set(phrase1.split(' '))
    set2 = set(phrase2.split(' '))
    return set1 != set2

def compare_word_sets(phrase1: str, phrase2: str):
    set1 = set(phrase1.split(''))
    set2 = set(phrase2.split(' '))
    return set1 == set2

def compare_word_sets(phrase1: str, phrase2: str):
    set1 = set(phrase1.split(' '))
    set2 = set(phrase2.split(''))
    return set1 == set2
